import React from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faTimes, faBars, faHome, faUser} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function HotelCard({ hotel: { id, name, price, images } }) { return (
Starting From {price}

Hotel {name}

); } export default HotelCard;
